channel.title: Posts on fish.farmR
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on fish.farmR

item.title: Exploring EU aquacultural economy (part_1)
item.description: purpose Explore aquaculture economic data from the European Commisson, Fisheries and Aquaculture: Scientific, Technical and Economic Committee for Fisheries (STECF). analyst note This is part 1. As I move through the stages of exploration, and when I feel like it might be worth sharing with you, I’ll post another part. Each part will include data and package load steps, so that they can be more stand-alone. data description Agency: European Commisson,Fisheries and Aquaculture.

item.title: Hello all and welcome!
item.description: Yo! Well isn’t this lovely! I get to pretend that I’m talking to the entire world. And yet I don’t want to speak to the whole world, I want to speak only to you, the person who wants to know more about world of aquaculture data analysis and visualization. I am so glad that you are here! We will have fun learning about this fascinating and growing ecosystem of information and real actions on the ground.
